title: Congratulating Union-Endicott senior Jordan Thomas upon the occasion of winning the Division 100-meter dash
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE   RESOLUTION  congratulating  Union-Endicott  senior  Jordan
Thomas upon the occasion of winning the Division I 100-meter dash at the
New York State Public High School Athletic Championship

WHEREAS, Excellence and success in competitive sports  can  be  achieved
only  through strenuous practice, team play and team spirit, nurtured by
dedicated coaching and strategic planning; and
  WHEREAS, Athletic competition enhances the moral and physical develop-
ment of the young people of this State, preparing them for the future by
instilling in them the value of  teamwork,  encouraging  a  standard  of
healthy living, imparting a desire for success and developing a sense of
fair play and competition; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to  congratu-
late  Union-Endicott  senior  Jordan Thomas upon the occasion of winning
the 100-meter dash at the New York State  Public  High  School  Athletic
Championship; and
  WHEREAS,  Running  his  final  scholastic  meet, Jordan Thomas won the
Division 1 100-meter dash title on Saturday, June 12, 2010, in  the  New
York State Public High School Athletic Association Track & Field Champi-
onships  at Dick Hoover Stadium; his 10.82 second clocking was 11-100ths
of a second faster than runner-up Donald Williams Jr., of  Midwood  High
School in Brooklyn; and
  WHEREAS,  Jordan Thomas' overall record is outstanding; he was loyally
and enthusiastically supported by family, fans, friends and the communi-
ty at large; and
  WHEREAS, Sports competition instills the values of teamwork, pride and
accomplishment, and Jordan Thomas has clearly made a contribution to the
spirit of excellence which is a tradition of their school;  now,  there-
fore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
congratulate Union-Endicott senior Jordan Thomas upon  the  occasion  of
winning  the Division I 100-meter dash at the New York State Public High
School Athletic Championship; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Jordan Thomas.
